}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "11340Y20PQ00303B1" and "2013/7/8" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The FCC manual states the default SSIDs for this device are '''DIR510L''' and '''DIR510L_5GHz'''.
The power adapter shown in the FCC photos is a '''D-Link''' branded PSAA10R-050 (100-240VAC ~ 50-60Hz, 21-29VA -> 5VDC, 2A).
The battery shown is an unbranded model [https://wiki.openwrt.org/_media/media/dlink/dir510l-screws.jpg 417002] (3.7V, 4000mAh, 14.8Wh).
{{WiFiCert|WFA50300|11/04/2013}} The '''WFA''''s certification notes this device is running Linux.
